config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used to set the number of photons in the InstantGI constructor. It retrieves the value from the 'gi.igi.samples' key in the Options object and assigns it to the numPhotons variable.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is triggered whenever an InstantGI object is created with the corresponding Options object. The frequency of triggering depends on how often InstantGI objects are instantiated in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is on the quality of the global illumination effect in the system. Setting a higher value for numPhotons may result in more accurate and detailed global illumination, but it can also increase the computational cost and memory usage.
